name: @esta-logic/helix
description: Pure functional Gleam accrual engine - compiles to WASM for Tauri pivot

scripts.build: if which gleam > /dev/null 2>&1; then gleam deps download --all && gleam build; else echo 'Gleam not installed - skipping helix build'; fi
scripts.test: if which gleam > /dev/null 2>&1; then gleam deps download --all && gleam test; else echo 'Gleam not installed - skipping helix tests'; fi
scripts.test:coverage: if which gleam > /dev/null 2>&1; then gleam deps download --all && gleam test; else echo 'Gleam not installed - skipping helix coverage'; fi
